title: 54. Will You Ever Go Back to Your Doctor’s Office?
description: When COVID hit, telemedicine use in the U.S. exploded. But how are we using it now? Bapu Jena explores the consequences of this evolving technology.
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: When COVID hit, telemedicine use in the U.S. exploded. But how are we using it now? Bapu Jena explores the consequences of this evolving technology.
